edu.umd.cs.psl.model.formula

Interface Formula

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Atom, AvgConjRule, AvgConjunction, Conjunction, Disjunction, GroundAtom, Negation, ObservedAtom, QueryAtom, RandomVariableAtom, Rule

    public interface Formula
    A logical formula composed of Atoms and logical operators.
